entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
